name: Block Puzzle Jewel Blast
description:
Block Puzzle Jewel Blast - Most popular and addictive puzzle game!

Once you start, you will never stop! Simple, beautiful, and Relax!

Simply drag the gems onto the screen, put the blocks in the 10x10 board, create and eliminate the entire line of vertical and horizontal directions, don't fill the entire screen for gems! The more you clear, the higher score you will get.

Tips:
-Place the blocks in a reasonable position
-Try to always leave big space
-The more jewels you eliminate, the more scores you have.

No need to connect internet, no time limit! Just a lot of fun!

Block Puzzle Jewel Blast -Features:
* Completely free
* Simple play and easy control
* Easy to play but hard to master
* Amazing graphics and sound effects
* Good for relaxing and brainstorming

Are you ready to play the beautiful and classic jewel games? Let's enjoy it!
